examples: The book describes her life from cradle to grave.
But the lawyers also described internal politics that at times slowed down the department's work or drove a wedge among members of the team.
And after the match, the Carlisle boss wasn't pulling his punches when describing his players' performance.
BBC is falling over backwards to be impartial by describing this as a crowd!
It was described as a large, luxury mobile home, but there was barely room to swing a cat.
words.defineEn: to give details about someone or something to say what they are like
words.defineVi: để cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó để nói họ như thế nào

examples: This book bridges a gulf between the metaphysics literature and philosophy of mind literature.
The book raises many important questions.
Every age has its book, after all.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
words.defineEn: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that we can turn them and read them
words.defineVi: một tập hợp các trang in được giữ lại với nhau trong một trang bìa để chúng ta có thể lật chúng và đọc chúng

examples: And from the gothic tradition, we get the fun page-turner stuff: the mysterious house with the person you don’t expect to be there, the mad wife, the arson, the stabbing, the shock of the interrupted marriage ceremony.
words.defineEn: a book or story that is so engaging and compelling that it keeps the reader eagerly turning the pages
words.defineVi: một cuốn sách hoặc câu chuyện hấp dẫn và hấp dẫn đến mức khiến người đọc háo hức lật trang

words.defineEn: (of a situation) exciting due to being full of suspense
words.defineVi: (của một tình huống) thú vị vì đầy hồi hộp

examples: Andy Weir’s The Martian, which sat on the Best Seller list for 76 weeks (19 of those at number one!) started as a series of blog posts that he compiled, self-published, and sold for 99 cents.
words.defineEn: a product, particularly a book, that has a very high number of sales
words.defineVi: một sản phẩm, đặc biệt là một cuốn sách, có số lượng bán ra rất cao

words.defineEn: a technique that helps one to read and understand a text with a faster speed
words.defineVi: một kỹ thuật giúp một người đọc và hiểu một văn bản với tốc độ nhanh hơn

examples: Just take out the trash like I asked you to, and none of your lip!
You know, you talk a lot of trash for someone who has yet to show us any moves.
If you ask me, it was Diana who treated him like trash and put the whole divorce thing in motion in the first place.
Jane popped the question instead of Nathan and she got treated as trash in return.

The small, dingy apartment that no one wanted turned out to be the perfect home for the struggling artist who saw its potential and turned it into a cozy and inspiring space - truly, one man's trash is another man's treasure.
words.defineEn: worthless, unwanted, and unneeded things that people throw away
words.defineVi: những thứ vô giá trị, không mong muốn và không cần thiết mà mọi người vứt đi

examples: Her second movie followed close on the heels of her successful film debut.
Her second movie followed close on the heels of her successful film debut.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The film faithfully follows Shakespeare's plot.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
words.defineEn: to understand something such as an explanation, story, or the meaning of something
words.defineVi: để hiểu một cái gì đó như một lời giải thích, câu chuyện, hoặc ý nghĩa của một cái gì đó
